title: cancalat-tApam
sahitya:
cancalat-tApam tIrum ayyA SaNmukhanE dayai paNNiyuDanE en


anupallavi

  anjali sheidunnai tanjamenraDuttu kenjiDum enniDam konjam krpai koNDu


caraNam    bAdhakam parppala purindavar enra pOdilum Adarikkum nAthan nIyanrO
nAdi nI tAn enru nADi vandE un pAdam paNindiDum pEdai endanadu
